lead_paragraph: Russia's athletics ban will run into 2017 and may include the August world championships after a Task Force monitoring the nation's anti-doping programme refused on Thursday to put any dates on a "road map" for a return.

headline.print_headline: Russia Athletics Ban to Run Into 2017
headline.main: Russia Athletics Ban to Run Into 2017
